channel.title: The blog thing if your into it.
channel.description:
I'm not so much showing off, I am asking for constructive criticism and support for a blog that I just started. I hope it will be somewhat insightful as well as people being able to relate to real life situations that I have come to realize over my life time to be a problem and finding a solution that may or may not work. I would like to build a community of people who are serious about the one life they get on this planet and to make the best out of it and support one another through their daily journey.
[url]https://ifthatmakesanysense.blogspot.com/[/url]
Is the site.
First blog is somewhat lengthy let me know what you think and how I can improve in really trying get the point across or just make it more clear.
Thank you.

item.title: The blog thing if your into it.
item.dc:creator: Savant
item.description:
Guzzi:

You have a disease Savant

it’s not a disease it’s a syndrome

item.title: The blog thing if your into it.
item.dc:creator: Guzzi
item.description:
sersoft:

welcome to year 2000

Hahaha, I know I’m behind. Honest question… Can you direct me to a more up to date means of expressing myself via the internet? (other than the obvious… Youtube) And did you even read it?

Read full topic
